content: Hi there! How are you today?
Hello! I'm doing well, thanks for asking. How can I help you today?
I need help organizing my project files. I have a lot of scattered documents.
I can definitely help with that! Let me suggest a file organization strategy.
Great! I prefer to organize by date and project type.
Perfect. I'll remember that you prefer date-based and project-type organization. Let's create folders like: 2024/ProjectA, 2024/ProjectB, etc.
Sounds good!
I'll start by scanning your documents directory. Found 142 files total.
Wow, that's a lot. Can you categorize them?
Yes! Here's the breakdown: 45 PDFs, 67 Word documents, 20 spreadsheets, 10 images.
Let's focus on the PDFs first.
Good idea. I'll organize the 45 PDFs by creation date and extract project keywords from filenames.
Thanks!
You're welcome! Starting the organization now.
Also, I want to keep all financial documents separate and encrypted.
Important decision noted: All financial documents will be kept in a separate encrypted folder. I'll tag any file with 'invoice', 'receipt', 'tax', or 'financial' in the name.
Perfect. Use AES-256 encryption.
Understood. I'll use AES-256 encryption for the financial documents folder.
How long will this take?
Estimated time: 5-7 minutes for full organization and encryption.
Okay, let me know when it's done.
Will do! I'll send you a completion notification.
